Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
HaselTweaks

- Changed: The configuration has been rewritten.
  - It now uses .NETs `System.Text.Json` instead of `Newtonsoft.Json`.
  - It'll create a backup of the current config to `%APPDATA%\XIVLauncher\pluginConfigs\HaselTweaks.json.bak` before migrating.
  - If the migration failed or the new config can't be loaded, please make an issue on GitHub and upload the dalamud.log (or just the error), the current config, and if available the backup. In my testing everything worked, but you never know... Good luck! :)
- Changed: Detection of inventory changes (currently only used for the Enhanced Material List tweak) now uses Dalamuds new `GameInventory` service.

Portrait Helper

- Fixed: The Preset Browser as a window (when using a larger font scaling) was not movable.
- Fixed: An error would occur when closing the portrait editor window.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog: - Fixed: "Queue" and "Recipe Tree" tabs didn't show crafting ingredients. Sorry about that!

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description:
MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).

The Rewards tab lists items of the "Newest ... Tomestone Exchange" shop with their collection status and price.  
You can also check the boxes to keep track of how many Tomestones you need at the top.

The Duties tab lists all the duties that reward Tomestones for the event.  
Clicking on a duty will open the Duty Finder with that duty selected.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
